approach: Add optional callback hooks (on_pre_save, on_post_save, on_post_load) to TodoStorage.__init__
changes: src/flywheel/storage.py - Added HookCallback type alias, optional hook parameters to __init__, and hook invocations in save() and load() methods
tests/test_issue_4836_storage_hooks.py - New test file with 8 test cases covering all acceptance criteria
acceptance_criteria_met: TodoStorage supports on_pre_save, on_post_save, on_post_load optional callbacks
Callbacks receive todos list as parameter
Not passing callbacks leaves behavior unchanged
Hooks are called in the correct order (pre_save before save, post_save after save, post_load after load)
risks: Hook exceptions will propagate to caller (explicit exception propagation as mentioned in acceptance criteria)
